humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze from " first " from " dog ". " First " as head of a hair-shaped. The original meaning is hair. Since the meaning of " dog " is unclear, Takada Tadashi believes that " dog " is the province of "犮". As the sound symbol of " fa ", Gao Hongjin also holds this view.

"Hui Lin Yinyi" Volume 5 "Beard and Hair" Annotation "Shuowen": "Hair, hair on the head."

Qin Jane " Dog the lower" word plus a dash, becomes the " Ba ", " Ba " is a sound character. Has also changed the signifier " first " to " shaggy ."

Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning of hair, and the historical wall plate: "Fa 彔 (義)", which means that Fu Lu is as much as hair (Qiu Xigui). It also pretends to be "祓" to express blessing. History Wall Plate: "Fanfa (祓) Duoli", "Er Ya. "Exegesis": "Zhu, Fu Ye." Uncle Xiangfu Gui: "Duo Fuyu (fan) Li" (Tang Lan, Li Xueqin, Xu Zhongshu). Also used as a name.

"Said Wen": "Fa, roots. From 髟, sound. 𩠖 (𩠙), fa or from the first. 𩑛, ancient prose." Duan Yucai and Zhu Junsheng changed "root also" to "hair on the head."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze from " first " from " dog ". " First " as head of a hair-shaped. The original meaning is hair. Since the meaning of " dog " is unclear, Takada Tadashi believes that " dog " is the province of "犮". As the sound symbol of " fa ", Gao Hongjin also holds this view.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「首」從「犬」。「首」象頭上有髮形。本義是頭髮。從「犬」之意不明，高田忠周認為「犬」是「犮」省，作為「髮」的聲符，高鴻縉亦持此說。

　　《慧琳音義》卷五「鬚髮」注引《說文》：「髮，頭上毛也。」

　　秦簡在「犬」字下部加一短橫，變為「犮」，「犮」是聲符。又改意符「首」為「髟」。

　　金文用作本義，表示頭髮，史牆盤：「髮彔(祿)」，表示福祿多如頭髮(裘錫圭)。又通假作「祓」，表示福。史牆盤：「繁髮(祓)多釐」，《爾雅．釋詁》：「祓，福也。」叔向父簋：「降余多福緐(繁)釐」(唐蘭、李學勤、徐中舒)。又用作人名。

　　《說文》：「髮，根也。从髟，犮聲。𩠖(𩠙)，髮或从首。𩑛，古文。」段玉裁、朱駿聲改「根也」為「頭上毛也」。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「首」從「犬」。「首」象頭上有髮形。本義是頭髮。從「犬」之意不明，高田忠周認為「犬」是「犮」省，作為「髮」的聲符，高鴻縉亦持此說。

金文從「 首 」從「 犬 」。「 首 」象頭上有髮形。本義是頭髮。從「 犬 」之意不明，高田忠周認為「 犬 」是「 犮 」省，作為「 髮 」的聲符，高鴻縉亦持此說。 《慧琳音義》卷五「鬚髮」注引《說文》：「髮，頭上毛也。」 秦簡在「 犬 」字下部加一短橫，變為「 犮 」，「 犮 」是聲符。又改意符「 首 」為「 髟 」。 金文用作本義，表示頭髮，史牆盤：「髮彔(祿)」，表示福祿多如頭髮(裘錫圭)。又通假作「 祓 」，表示福。史牆盤：「繁髮(祓)多釐」，《爾雅．釋詁》：「祓，福也。」叔向父簋：「降余多福緐(繁)釐」(唐蘭、李學勤、徐中舒)。又用作人名。 《說文》：「髮，根也。从髟，犮聲。𩠖(𩠙)，髮或从首。𩑛，古文。」段玉裁、朱駿聲改「根也」為「頭上毛也」。

As the sound symbol of " fa", Gao Hongjin also holds this view. "Hui Lin Yinyi" Volume 5 "Beard and Hair" Annotation "Shuowen": "Hair, hair on the head." Qin Jane " Dog the lower" word plus a dash, becomes the " Ba", " Ba" is a sound character. Has also changed the signifier " first" to " shaggy." Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning of hair, and the historical wall plate: "Fa 彔 (義)", which means that Fu Lu is as much as hair (Qiu Xigui). It also pretends to be " 祓" to express blessing. History Wall Plate: "Fanfa (祓) Duoli", "Er Ya. "Exegesis": "Zhu, Fu Ye." Uncle Xiangfu Gui: "Duo Fuyu (fan) Li" (Tang Lan, Li Xueqin, Xu Zhongshu). 髮字的基本解释

髮
fà
见“发2”。

髮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fà］
［《廣韻》方伐切，入月，非。］
“发3”的繁体字。亦作“髪1”。亦作“1”。
(1)头发。
(2)蓄发。
(3)草木。
(4)细长、狭长之称，相当于“綫”、“脉”等。
(5)旧时对太平天囯起义军的称呼。
(6)量词。尺的万分之一。泛指极小之量。
(7)姓。汉有东海发福。见《汉书·儒林传·赵子》。

髮字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　髮； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1453第21
〔古文〕????【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?方伐切，音發。【說文】根也。【玉篇】首上毛也。【釋名】髮，拔也。拔擢而出也。【黃帝素問】腎之華在髮。【草木子】血之榮以髮。　又【莊子·逍遙遊】窮髮之北。【音義】髮，猶毛也。北極之下，無毛之地也。毛，草也。地理書云：山以草木爲髮。　又姓。【前漢·儒林傳】東海髮福。又禿髮，複姓。　又叶方味切，音沸。【潘岳·藉田賦】被褐振裾，垂髫總髮。躡踵側肩，掎裳連襼。

髮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
髮字的起名意思

暂无。

hair
fà

hair
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fà］
["Guangyun" Fang cut, enter the month, non. ]
"发3" in traditional characters. Also known as "髪1". Also called "1".
(1) Hair.
(2) Hair accumulation.
(3) Vegetation.
(4) The name of slender and narrow, equivalent to "line", "pulse" and so on.
(5) The old name for the Taiping Rebellion Army.
(6) Quantifiers. One ten-thousandth of a ruler. Refers to a very small amount in general.
(7) Last name. Han has the East China Sea to be blessed. See "The Book of Han · The Biography of Rulin · Zhao Zi".
hair
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【Yunzi Department】　fa; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1453 Page 21
[Ancient text]???? [Tang Yun] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Fang cut, sound made. [Said the text] The root is also. [Jade articles] The first hair is also on. 【Release name】Fat, pull also. Out of it too. [Huangdisu Question] The blossom of the kidney is in hair. [Cao Muzi] The glory of blood is made.　[Zhuangzi·Xiaoyaoyou] The north of the poor. [Sound and Meaning] Hair is still hairy. Under the North Pole, there is also a barren land. Mao and grass. Geography book says: Mountains are made of vegetation.　Another last name. [Previous Han · Rulin Biography] The East China Sea is blessed. He is bald again and has a surname.　The flavor of the leaves is cut again, and the sound boils. 【Pan Yue·Jitian Fu】Because of brown vibration, his hair is down. Tuck your heels on your shoulders, and fold your clothes in a row.
